content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Ore Mining and Processing Facility at position (-25.0, -64.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-25.0, -64.0) extracting copper ore, connected to a transport belt system.
- Transport Belt Group connecting from position (-26.5, -65.5) to (-23.5, -64.5), facilitating the movement of copper ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-23.0, -66.0) intended for smelting copper ore, currently not receiving ingredients.

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) extracting iron ore, depositing into a wooden chest.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5) storing iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) for smelting iron ore, currently not receiving ingredients.
- Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) intended for storing smelted iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) for transferring items from the chest to the furnace.

### Coal Mining Facility at position (53.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) extracting coal, depositing into a wooden chest.
- Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5) storing coal.

### Additional Storage and Transport Infrastructure
- Wooden Chest at position (-21.5, -65.5) storing coal.
- Burner Inserter at position (-20.5, -65.5) transferring items between chests and furnaces.
- Belt Group at position (-14.5, -54.5) to (-17.5, -59.5), currently empty.

## ERROR TIPS

### Assertion Error: Copper Ore Not Reaching Furnace
- Ensure that the transport belt system is correctly connected and operational to deliver copper ore to the furnace. Check for any disconnections or blockages in the belt system.

### Errors Due to Out of Fuel Status
- Regularly check and refuel burner mining drills and inserters to maintain continuous operation.

### Errors When Furnace Lacks Ingredients
- Ensure that the transport system is effectively delivering the necessary raw materials to the furnaces. Verify that the input belts are correctly aligned and functioning.

### Errors When Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors When Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
